name: podsync
description: Podsync is a self-hosted YouTube-to-podcast converter that turns YouTube channels into RSS feeds. It downloads and serves audio files, making content available in podcast apps.
features: YouTube to podcast: Convert YouTube channels and playlists into podcast RSS feeds.
Audio extraction: Extract audio from YouTube videos and serve as podcast episodes.
RSS feed generation: Create standard RSS feeds compatible with all podcast apps.
Automatic updates: Monitor YouTube channels for new videos and add them to feeds automatically.
Multiple channels: Convert multiple YouTube channels into separate podcast feeds.
Quality selection: Configure audio quality and format for downloaded content.
Episode metadata: Include video titles, descriptions, and thumbnails in podcast feeds.
Storage management: Automatically delete old episodes to manage disk space usage.
Custom feed URLs: Serve podcast feeds on custom URLs for easy subscription.
Vimeo support: Convert Vimeo channels in addition to YouTube content.
Episode filtering: Configure rules to include only specific videos based on criteria.
Podcast app compatible: Works with Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and other standard podcast clients.
